strings.string: \rYou see three outlaws with their backs turned catching a few puffs.\r
\rWhile they aren't looking you ambush them and knock them out.\r
\rThey hear you stumble through the door and attack.\r
\rLooks like you might be able to use a rope.\r
\rThat won't get you to the top.\r
\rThrough the glass skylight you can see figures moving in the shadows.\r
\rIt might be possible to break the glass, leap down and surprise them.\r
\rYou leap through the broken glass to the floor below.\r
\rThere is no way you could climb the wall here.\r
"Hey Joe, no one gets in or out without the password."\r
\r"Oh, you must have just come from the courthouse."\r
\r"Wrong buddy! The password is 'Die you scumbag!'"\r
A huge bouncer stands in your way.\r
You are being viciously barked at.\r
\rA tall fence is here to keep in the dogs.\r
\rYou are on the top of the fence.\r
\rYou are still on the other side.\r
\rThe bookcase is full of Mercenaries, Spies & Private Eyes books.\r
\rYou are at the entrance to the
\rAs you step next to a pile of laundry...\r
\rThere are some dusty jars on the table.\r
\rYou take a closer look and find something interesting...\r
\rThis is the entrance to the officer's club.\r
\rYou find a secret door and enter.\r
\rThe door says, "I'm Ugly and you're not."\r
\rThere is a map of Quartz on the wall. Read paragraph 109.\r

\rA voice from inside the room says, "What took you so long?" You see Felicia Pedros wired in a chair with a bomb in her lap. Ugly John stands near with an Uzi in one hand and a deadman-switch in the other.\r
\r"Hold it. I wouldn't come any closer if I were you."\r
\rThe mayor turns to you, anguish washing across his face, and says, "We must save my wife!"\r
\rUgly says, "Let me walk out of here alive and I'll give you the code that will let you disarm the bomb. You don't look like you could do it without it."\r
\rUgly says, "Read paragraph 26." He then flips a switch on the bomb and runs off.\r
\rYou see Felicia's bomb flashing yellow and red lights.\r
\rYou successfully disarm the bomb. Felicia is very grateful.\r
\rThis door is sealed like a vault.\r
"I'm Ace. Please get me out of here."\r
\rYou hear some rustling in this cell.\r
\rSnipers from the roof fire at you.\r
\rYou notice something odd about the map and move it.\r
There is a safe here. Try to O)pen it or enter combination ("XX-XX-XX").\r

but fail
s

 to inflict any damage

reducing 
\x0ehim\x0eher\x0eit\x0e
\x0f of them
 into an undertaker's nightmare

reducing 
\x0ehim\x0eher\x0eit\x0e
\x0f of them
 into a thin red paste
